https://tmrev.io/movie/416051-Based on a True Story 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/w9OGJ6bE5vNYyIjIPz9QUqBO1ya.jpg Delphine is the author of an autobiographical novel that has become a bestseller. Exhausted by the promotional tour, just when she feels out of place, paralyzed by the idea of having to start writing again, she meets Elle, a young, attractive, intelligent, intuitive woman who seems to understand her better than anyone. Based on a True Story
